source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_00<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((The first stars flash their pale bellies in the depth of the sky)) ((A fresh morning breeze makes the pennons snap)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((A clear, strong light is on the quay)) ((The first stars flash their pale bellies in the depth of the sky)) /var>)) /var>, and Ahldfoet the sailor is in a mood to yarn.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_00<tab>Ahldfoet hat einen Auftrag für dich.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_01<tab>Ahldfoet has a slightly grisly request, though you are now an old hand at dismemberment. Hunt dusk bats and collect from them five wings.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_01<tab>Ahldfoet bittet dich, in der Umgebung von Bierhafen <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F2016B030502 /var> zu erlegen und ihre Flügel einzusammeln.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_02<tab>You have liberated the wings from less-than-cooperative dusk bats. Deliver the leathery trophies to Ahldfoet.

TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_03<tab>The talismans tucked away in his cavernous pocket, Ahldfoet finally gives free rein to his tongue. While you itch to hear more of this tale, it seems clear that for now, the teller is content to let it lie.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_SEQ_03<tab>Für den abergläubischen Ahldfoet sind <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8848030202 /var> Talismane. Er hofft, sich die Fähigkeiten der Fledermäuse zu eigen machen zu können.
TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_TODO_00<tab><var 2B ((<var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F2016B030502 /var>)) /var> erlegen und ihre Flügel einsammeln

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_TODO_01<tab>Give the dusk bat wings to Ahldfoet.

TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_000<tab>Ahoy, adventurer. My tub sails soon and I have to have me a little something for the journey. The dusk bats are flying─think yerself lightsome enough to bring me five wings? Four won't do and six is no good, mind ye.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_000<tab>Hallo, <var 08 E905 ((Abenteurerin)) ((Abenteurer)) /var>! Ich wette, du bist die Nummer 1 im Monsterjagen! Habe ich Recht? Dann wollen wir doch mal sehen, wie schnell du mir fünf <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8848030502 /var> besorgen kannst. Dafür musst du nur ein paar ... warte, jetzt kommt's ... <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F2016B030502 /var> erlegen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_001<tab>Welcome you are to keep any surfeits, 'slong as ye know what to do with 'em. You'll bring me the wings?
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_001<tab>Das wäre wirklich nett von dir. Deine gute Tat des Tages, sozusagen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_010<tab>Ahoy there. Keep your voice down, nobody's business but ours, innit? You got what I asked for?
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_010<tab>Und? Hast du, worum ich dich gebeten habe?

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_011<tab>Them's the ones, and that's as pretty a job as I've seen. Know your way 'round a battle, eh? Well, that's just fine, thank ye.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_011<tab>Ja, genau richtig! Du bist <var 08 E905 ((ein gutes Mädchen)) ((ein guter Junge)) /var>.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_012<tab>Why? We sailors can be a superstitious lot, ye know. Some of the crew might look at me odd-like for carrying bat parts. When the wind's done died and the water casks are dry, it's <var 1A 02 /var>odd<var 1A 01 /var> one day, <var 1A 02 /var>overboard<var 1A 01 /var> the next.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_012<tab>Für mich sind Fledermäuse besondere Tiere ... weder Vögel noch Vierbeiner, sondern irgendetwas dazwischen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_013<tab>What? No superstition about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>. The dusker's been my luck since I was a boy. Survived more'n two weeks once on three bats I caught, trapped at the top of an abandoned watchtower. Even ate a wing off one afore I made up my mind up to climb down the wall.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_013<tab>Sie sind Meister der Anpassung. Ursprünglich Waldtiere, die nun in den ver<var 16 /var>schie<var 16 /var>den<var 16 /var>sten Landschaften anzutreffen sind. Und sie haben einzigartige Fähigkeiten entwickelt, um auch in der Dunkelheit der Nacht sicher navigieren und jagen zu können.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_014<tab>This journey, we'll be sailing past the Isles of Umbra and I can feel the sea honing those reefs. The lights at Pharos Sirius burn dim since the Calamity, and I've always found it a mite too much like that old watchtower for comfort.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_014<tab>Ich fahre oft des Nachts raus zu den Phantominseln. Es ist nicht leicht, das Schiff von den Riffen fernzuhalten. <var 2B ((<var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8848030202 /var>)) /var> werden gute Talismane abgeben und mich genau wie eine Fledermaus sicher um die heimtückischen Felsen navigieren lassen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_015<tab>I ain't been that affrighted boy for a long time─ill-used, starved, and more'n half-mad, inching down that sandstone wall on handholds no bigger than a fingertip. But I'll have me five bat wings on every journey, just the same as that boy had.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA154_01145_AHLDFOET_000_015<tab>Besonders jetzt, da das Leuchtfeuer des Pharos Sirius erloschen ist. Da darf ich mir keinen Fehler erlauben, sonst lerne ich das Meer schnell von unten kennen.
